• Bitcoin appeared to be repeating the 2020 run, an analyst noted.

articles.content: Fast food giant McDonalds has experienced systems failures in several countries that led to some of its restaurants being shuttered for hours, but ruled out cybersecurity issues as a potential cause … [+1484 chars]
